summary: This bill, the Save Our Seas 2.0 Amendments Act, aims to improve the administration of the Marine Debris Foundation and the Marine Debris Program within the National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration (NOAA). It modifies the Marine Debris Act by updating grant processes, redefining terms, and restructuring sections related to the Foundation's board, powers, and principal office. The bill also includes provisions for outreach to Indigenous communities, authorization of appropriations, and various conforming amendments.
